title: do something about these people
body:
the lemon gamer
killermex1080
these people are ruining our games by purposely feeding hard just because the lemon gamer called yop and said he was top while i actually called top and killermex 1080 for not even calling anything and forcing himself to jungle. please do something like a ban.

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules

We cannot ban people.

Submit a support ticket to report others.
